definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

pinyin: An1 hui1 Jian4 zhu4 Gong1 ye4 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: It is also named green architecture of city cave-house.
sentences.chinese: 這種建築也可稱爲“城市窯洞”式綠色建築。

sentences.english: It is also named green architecture of city cave-house.
sentences.chinese: 這種建築也可稱爲“城市窯洞”式綠色建築。

sentences.english: We are the country with five-thousand-year culture, old buildings are one of the evidences.
sentences.chinese: 我們是用五千年文化的國家，舊建築物的依據之一。

sentences.english: This construction has survived the Crimean War and the WWII.
sentences.chinese: 這幢建築在克里米亞戰爭和二戰中得以倖存。

sentences.english: Low wall or story above the cornice of a classical fa?ade.
sentences.chinese: 古典建築中正面飛檐上的矮牆或矮樓。

sentences.english: Heat surroundings cosiness index is a important target of energy efficiency design in buildings.
sentences.chinese: 熱環境舒適度指標是建築節能設計的關鍵之一。

sentences.english: The tanks shall be firmly fixed onto the ground.
sentences.chinese: 該貯槽必須牢固建築於地上。

sentences.english: Wolter products are used both in general building services applications as well as various industrial areas.
sentences.chinese: 華徳產品一般是用在建築服務和各種工業領域。

sentences.english: The heat generated in the compression phase is normally radiated into the air outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 壓縮階段產生熱量一般被輻射到建築物外的空氣中。

sentences.english: How can developers and landscape architects work with architects, engineers to bring enough part of the greening into our buildings?
sentences.chinese: 建築和景觀的共融形成了會呼吸的建築物的概念。

sentences.english: How can developers and landscape architects work with architects, engineers to bring enough part of the greening into our buildings?
sentences.chinese: 建築和景觀的共融形成了會呼吸的建築物的概念。

sentences.english: The Dogon are best known for their masked dances, wooden sculptures and architecture.
sentences.chinese: 多貢是最著名的爲他們的蒙面舞蹈，木雕和建築。

sentences.english: An imposing facade, building, person, personality.
The building is topped with a flat, landscaped roof that can be accessed via an exterior staircase.
sentences.chinese: 建築頂部是可以通過外部樓梯進入的水平景觀屋面。

sentences.english: Jin Mao Tower was completed in 1999 and is the fourth tallest building of the world.
sentences.chinese: 金茂大廈於1999年完工，是世界第四高的建築物。

sentences.english: The view is of the nondescript building across the street.
sentences.chinese: 風景就是對面街那不可名狀的建築物。
